job.title: Data Scientist (Predictive Analytics)
job.description: ltpgtFocus Capital is supporting itsampnbsphealth technology group by providing an effective Data Scientist who will work to develop stateoftheart predictive analytic data models to optimize revenue opportunities for the marketing and sales teamsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThis ideal candidate must be technical and capable of driving digital innovation among the data engineers while also capable of interfacing with business stakeholders and conducting predictive modelsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThis role will start remotely however at some point in the future we will want someone who can come in once every 1015 days Therefore you must be local to NY or NJ or open to relocatingltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtThe total compensation and benefits offered are completely unmatched in the industryltstronggtltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtMINIMUM REQUIREMENTSampnbspltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt3 years as a data scientistltligtltligtExperience building predictive models in Python and its frameworks ie Pandas PySpark etcltligtltligtProfessional experience deploying machine learning modelsltligtltligtPrior experience with Spark and SQLltligtltligtExperience with Random Forest Logistic Regression Linear Regression supervised and unsupervised models etcltligtltligtExperience in a cloud environment ie AWS or AzureltligtltligtAzure Databricks experience is a plusltligtltligtAbility to translate complex mathematical models and data science concepts into business decisions and vice versaltligtltligtMasters degree in computer science statistics or engineering or 5 years of experienceltligtltulgt
